lop: Fixes a bug in the Karma Render Properties LOP which stripped layers above layer breaks when merging the render properties, products and rendervars.
In the loputils module, use IsA(UsdGeom.PointInstancer) to check if a prim is a point instancer instead of looking at the type name.

sop: Change order of operations to reduce number of tests to see if display and render flags are the same, this can avoid surprising cooks when parameters have to be evaluated.
The Vellum Reference Frame was double counting pivots when computing angular velocity, causing extreme motion if the reference geometry was away from the origin.

karma: Fixed a possible crash in karma when rendering an image when there were no AOVs with LPEs.

sop: Fixed a bug in the RBD Cone Twist Constraints SOP which tagged the motor_target and motor_targetprev attributes as quaternions while they are relative to the constrained pieces and shouldn't be transformed.
